name: Inconvenient Store
description:
Welcome to the inconvenience store, where nothing is easy to find, prices are higher then ever, and our guards attack you on sight! Yall come back now!

Controls: Walk: WASD | Sprint: Left Shift | Crouch : Left Control | Pickup Product: E | Throw Product: Left Click | Drop Product: E Again

There are a couple of weird bugs. Quick tip - IF YOUR MOUSE IS STUCK IN THE MENU, PRESS ESCAPE.

This turned out a lot better then I expected. While it's still buggy, I'm very happy with it, and I hope you are too :)

Thanks! - Collin
